extensionName.description: Name of extension, of course IDN Safe ;)

extensionDescription.message: IDN Safe is a browser extension which blocks internationalized domain names to prevent you from visiting probable fake sites.
extensionDescription.description: Description of the extension to give the user an insight into this extension.

textPopupDescription.message: Below is a list of blocked domains. You can allow them by clicking the checkboxes and pressing the corresponding button.

buttonAllowTemp.description: Button which will allow blocked domains temporarily.

buttonAllowAlways.description: Button which will allow blocked domains always - whitelist.

textNoBlockedDomains.description: If no request has been blocked this message should be shown in popup.

textSettingsTitle.description: Title and heading for the settings page.

textSettingsWhiteListTitle.description: Title for the whitelist card on options page.

textSettingsWhiteListDescription.message: Below is a list of your allowed domains. Check them and press the button to remove them.
textSettingsWhiteListDescription.description: Description for the whitelist card on options page.

buttonRemoveFromWhitelist.description: Button to remove whitelisted domains on options page.

textRemovedFromWhitelist.description: Snackbar info when domains has been removed from whitelist.

textNoWhitelistedDomains.description: Text shown in options page when no domain is whitelisted.

buttonRevokeAllTemporary.description: Button text to revoke all temporarily allowed domains

textRevokedFromTemp.description: Snackbar info when domains has been revoked from temporary list.
